faqs.title: Firmware upload fails
faqs.answer: If you are having issues trying to update (or "flash") your trackers, you can find potential fixes at https://docs.slimevr.dev/common-issues.html#please-specify-upload_port-while-updating-firmware--trying-to-upload-firmware-fails.

faqs.answer: If the SlimeVR server is not opening, you can find potential fixes at https://docs.slimevr.dev/common-issues.html#the-slimevr-server-wont-start.

faqs.answer: If your tracker's serial output is only random symbols, you can find potential fixes at https://docs.slimevr.dev/common-issues.html#the-wi-fi-settings-window-outputs-symbols-and-nothing-else.

faqs.answer: If you are getting a "Sensor was reset error" on your tracker's serial logs, you can find potential fixes at https://docs.slimevr.dev/common-issues.html#sensor-was-reset-error.

faqs.title: SlimeVR server setup
faqs.answer: SlimeVR does not take long to setup and you only need to do it once. For official SlimeVR trackers, you can find a guide to setup at https://docs.slimevr.dev/quick-setup.html. For any other trackers, you can find a guide to setup at https://docs.slimevr.dev/server/initial-setup.html.

faqs.title: Shipping estimate
faqs.answer: As of August 16th, 2023, any new orders placed are estimated to ship on **January 31st, 2024** (this provided date is subject to change, please check the [CrowdSupply page](https://www.crowdsupply.com/slimevr/slimevr-full-body-tracker#products) for the latest information). For the latest information on shipping and production progress, you can check the [#when-my-order-ships](https://discord.com/channels/817184208525983775/1129107343058153623), [#updates](https://discord.com/channels/817184208525983775/818062236492759050), and [#production-progress](https://discord.com/channels/817184208525983775/1025118385585004544) channels on the [SlimeVR Discord](https://discord.gg/SlimeVR) or visit the CrowdSupply page at https://www.crowdsupply.com/slimevr/slimevr-full-body-tracker.

faqs.title: Using 3 trackers with SlimeVR
faqs.answer: It's not recommended to use 3 trackers. If you use 3 trackers, you won't be able to bend your legs (commonly referred to as "Minecraft" legs). You can see a demonstration of different combinations of trackers in ZRock's video at https://youtu.be/iKmrNKLacwk. You can find more information about how many trackers you need at https://docs.slimevr.dev/slimevr101.html#how-many-trackers-do-you-need.

faqs.title: Amazon trackers
faqs.answer: **__Don't__** buy trackers from Amazon. Buying trackers from Amazon is not recommended as there have been many reports of faulty trackers from Amazon. You can check in the [#amazon-trackers](https://discord.com/channels/817184208525983775/986713204656857138) channel on the [SlimeVR Discord](https://discord.gg/SlimeVR) for more information.
matched_questions: are the amazon trackers ok to buy?
should I buy trackers from amazon or will they suck?

faqs.title: Amazon trackers issues with serial console
faqs.answer: If you're having trouble connecting your trackers with the serial monitor, you may have unofficial trackers from Amazon. If so, it's recommended that you just return them, otherwise if you really want to try to make them work, you can check in the [#amazon-trackers](https://discord.com/channels/817184208525983775/986713204656857138) channel on the [SlimeVR Discord](https://discord.gg/SlimeVR) for more information.

faqs.title: Config and log locations
faqs.answer: The app data for the SlimeVR server is located at `%AppData%\dev.slimevr.SlimeVR` as of v0.9.0.
matched_questions: how do I find the logs for SlimeVR

faqs.title: Official Trackers - Blue Light of Death (BLOD)
faqs.answer: Symptoms of this hardware issue that may occur on some of the **official** trackers include solid blue light (not blinking), suddenly stopped working, or suddenly stopped connecting to WiFi/SlimeVR server. Direct message Eiren with your order number, name, shipping address, and phone number for instructions on getting your replacement tracker(s).

faqs.title: Official Trackers - Broken/Missing Extension Cables
faqs.answer: There are two ways of getting replacement cables for your **official** tracker sets: [SlimeVR Store](https://shop.slimevr.dev/) (You will be helping SlimeVR pay for shipping cost) or by direct messaging Eiren with your order number, name, shipping address, phone number, and SlimeVR tracker set name.
matched_questions: my tracker cable is missing from the box
the extension wire broke when I was using it
how do I get a replacement cable?
